news.title: Reeves backs away from income tax rates rise after improved economic forecasts
news.summary: The chancellor had been widely expected to increase income tax rates, which would have broken a manifesto promise.

news.title: Man admits lacing sweets with sedatives and assaulting boys at summer camp
news.summary: Jon Ruben, 76, pleads guilty to a series of charges including sex offences against two young boys.

news.title: Arrest after man suspected of posing as navy admiral at Remembrance event
news.summary: Police said a naval uniform and a selection of medals were seized from the man's home.

news.title: Trump to order investigation into Epstein's alleged ties to Clinton and banks
news.summary: Trump said on social media he was seeking investigations into Clinton, Larry Summers as well as JP Morgan and other major banks.

news.title: 'Astonishingly lethal': BBC reports from site of Russian strike in Kyiv
news.summary: The BBC's James Landale reports from the east of the capital where a drone struck a multi-storey residential building.

news.title: Crowds brave heavy rain as King Charles makes birthday trip to south Wales
news.summary: The King has visited south Wales as a new photo is published for his 77th birthday.

news.title: Weather warnings in force as Storm Claudia brings heavy rain to UK
news.summary: The storm has brought flooding and downpours, with some areas expecting up to a month's worth of rain in a day.

news.title: MP quits Corbyn's new left-wing party amid infighting
news.summary: Independent MP Adnan Hussain claims there is a "toxic" culture in Your Party as he announces he is leaving it.

news.title: Sarah Ferguson's new book withdrawn from sale, says Nielsen
news.summary: The latest children's book by the former duchess had already been delayed.

news.title: Several killed after bus crashes into Stockholm bus stop
news.summary: Several others have have been injured in the crash in the Swedish capital, police say.
